themes: Building trust through community liaison roles
key_phrases: Targeted Outreach and Funding for Culturally Specific and Underserved Communities
community liaison roles within ACME focused on building trust
Grants specifically designated for projects from historically marginalized communities
simplified application processes and cultural competency in review
barriers_identified: lack of deep engagement with specific cultural groups
solutions_proposed: Create community liaison roles focused on building trust and understanding needs
Designate grants specifically for historically marginalized communities
Ensure cultural competency in grant review
